title: Dagger with Sheath and Belt
medium: Steel, buffalo horn covered with granulated and repousse sheet silver, leather and cotton brocaded with metal thread
dimensions:
dagger, length: 12 in.
sheath, length: 8 in.
belt, length: 32 in.
